title: Alex Morton - Let’s Talk About Network Marketing
itunes:title: Alex Morton - Let’s Talk About Network Marketing
description:
What comes to your mind when you hear the words, "network marketing"? If you scoff and think about pyramid schemes, it's time to re-evaluate the examples you've been given. Just like in any other industry, the ones who succeed are the least glamorous - but they've put in the work.
 
Alex Morton grew up wanting the lifestyles he saw the elite around him living - and he simply went out and got it, through books and an open attitude and plain, driven hard work. Nearly a decade and $30 million later, Alex continues to educate his audiences with wisdom for growth that comes from having done it all himself.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach and Alex dive deep on the misconceptions that fuel the stigma against network marketing, the importance of building a personal brand, and why the right mindset is the key to your success. Join the conversation to shift your mindset beyond what seems possible.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/alex-morton/
 
Get More Involved:

  2. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
